Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    We ll still stick to columns first and rows second for the counting

      • getCloseRow

        public int getCloseRow(Direction direc,
              int position)
        Parameters:
        direc - Which direction to look for the closest filled cell on the same row
        position - The cell number (in position number format)
        Returns:
        Index of column the closest filled cell is in or -1 if there are none (borders = restrictions)

      • getCloseCol

        public int getCloseCol(Direction direc,
              int position)
        Parameters:
        direc - Which direction to look for the closest filled cell on the same col
        position - The cell coordinates which contain x and y
        Returns:
        Index of row the closest filled cell is in or -1 if there are none (borders = restrictions)
